metadata.title: Fluent Assertions
metadata.description: A very extensive set of extension methods for .NET 3.5, 4.0 and Silverlight 4.0 that allow you to more naturally specify the expected outcome of a TDD or BDD-style unit test.
metadata.releaseNotes: And() extension method to TimeSpanConversionExtensions to support 4.Hours().And(30.Minutes())
metadata.tags: MSTest xUnit NUnit TDD BDD Fluent Silverlight
